title: Firefly to launch a Lockheed Martin satellite antenna demonstration
summary: The next launch by Firefly Aerospace, scheduled for December, will be an electronically steerable antenna payload designed by Lockheed Martin for a technology demonstration.

title: Firefly Set to Launch Lockheed Martin Tech Demo In December
summary: Firefly set to launch their next Alpha rocket in December, carrying Lockheed Martin Electronically Steerable Antenna Payload Tech Demo

title: Fly The Lightning
summary: Texas based Firefly Aerospace is looking to launch their second mission this year. Their Alpha rocket will be launching on a mission dubbed “Fly The Lightning”, which will be the vehicles first operational commercial launch. On board will be Tantrum, a commercial payload being operated by Lockheed Martin. Liftoff is currently slated for Wednesday morning.
